00048 SUMOVTypeParameter::SUMOVTypeParameter() :
00049         id(DEFAULT_VTYPE_ID), length(DEFAULT_VEH_LENGTH), minGap(
00050                 DEFAULT_VEH_MINGAP), maxSpeed(DEFAULT_VEH_MAXSPEED), defaultProbability(
00051                 DEFAULT_VEH_PROB), speedFactor(DEFAULT_VEH_SPEEDFACTOR), speedDev(
00052                 DEFAULT_VEH_SPEEDDEV), emissionClass(SVE_UNKNOWN), color(
00053                 RGBColor::DEFAULT_COLOR), vehicleClass(SVC_UNKNOWN), width(
00054                 DEFAULT_VEH_GUIWIDTH), shape(DEFAULT_VEH_SHAPE), cfModel(
00055                 DEFAULT_VEH_FOLLOW_MODEL), lcModel(
00056                 DEFAULT_VEH_LANE_CHANGE_MODEL), setParameter(0), saved(false), onlyReferenced(
00057                 false), mass(1540.0), rolling_res(0.0048), air_dens(1.25), frontal_area(
00058                 1.89), drag_coefficient(0.19), Gear_ratio(37.0), Gear_sys_effc(
00059                 0.95), regen_ratio(0.5), motor_sys_effc(0.95), cooper_losses(
00060                 0.3), iron_losses(0.1), windage_losses(0.000005), constant_losses(
00061                 600.0), power_accs(250.0), num_cells(156.0), capacity(60.0), time_charge(
00062                 10), celsius(15.0), humidity(25), aux_mask("00000000"), light_mask(
00063                 "00000000"), vehicle_headligths_consumption(316.0 * 0.65), front_fog_ligths_consumption(
00064                 316.0 * 0.30), cockpit_ligths_consumption(316 * 0.05), radio_consumption(
00065                 52), heatingAC_consumption(489) {
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SUMOVTypeParameter::write(OutputDevice& dev) const {
00069     if (onlyReferenced) {
00070         return;
00071     }
00072     dev.openTag(SUMO_TAG_VTYPE);
00073     dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_ID, id);
00074     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_LENGTH_SET)) {
00075         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_LENGTH, length);
00076     }
00077     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_MINGAP_SET)) {
00078         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_MINGAP, minGap);
00079     }
00080     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_MAXSPEED_SET)) {
00081         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_MAXSPEED, maxSpeed);
00082     }
00083     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_PROBABILITY_SET)) {
00084         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_PROB, defaultProbability);
00085     }
00086     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_SPEEDFACTOR_SET)) {
00087         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_SPEEDFACTOR, speedFactor);
00088     }
00089     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_SPEEDDEVIATION_SET)) {
00090         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_SPEEDDEV, speedDev);
00091     }
00092     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_VEHICLECLASS_SET)) {
00093         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_VCLASS, toString(vehicleClass));
00094     }
00095     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_EMISSIONCLASS_SET)) {
00096         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_EMISSIONCLASS,
00097                 getVehicleEmissionTypeName(emissionClass));
00098     }
00099     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_SHAPE_SET)) {
00100         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_GUISHAPE, getVehicleShapeName(shape));
00101     }
00102     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_WIDTH_SET)) {
00103         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_GUIWIDTH, width);
00104     }
00105     if (wasSet(VTYPEPARS_COLOR_SET)) {
00106         dev.writeAttr(SUMO_ATTR_COLOR, color);
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (cfParameter.size() != 0) {
00110         dev << ">\n";
00111         dev.openTag(cfModel);
00112         std::vector<SumoXMLAttr> attrs;
00113         for (CFParams::const_iterator i = cfParameter.begin();
00114                 i != cfParameter.end(); ++i) {
00115             attrs.push_back(i->first);
00116         }
00117         std::sort(attrs.begin(), attrs.end());
00118         for (std::vector<SumoXMLAttr>::const_iterator i = attrs.begin();
00119                 i != attrs.end(); ++i) {
00120             dev.writeAttr(*i, cfParameter.find(*i)->second);
00121         }
00122         dev.closeTag(true);
00123         dev.closeTag();
00124     } else {
00125         dev.closeTag(true);
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 double SUMOVTypeParameter::getMass() const {
00130     return mass;
00131 }
00132 
00133 double SUMOVTypeParameter::getTimeCharge() const {
00134     return time_charge;
00135 }
00136 
00137 void SUMOVTypeParameter::setTimeCharge(double time_charge) {
00138     this->time_charge = time_charge;
00139 }
